abstract: TerraPower, a start-up company with a design for a nuclear reactor that extracts far more energy from uranium than do conventional ones has attracted a $35 million investment from venture capital firms.
snippet: TerraPower, a start-up company with a design for a nuclear reactor that extracts far more energy from uranium than do conventional ones has attracted a $35 million investment from venture capital firms.
lead_paragraph: A start-up company with a design for a nuclear reactor that extracts far more energy from uranium than do conventional ones has attracted a $35 million investment from venture capital firms, Matthew Wald reports in The New York Times.
